alert.note: Alert for Adams; Brown; Calhoun; Pike (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 04 at 10:57PM CDT until August 05 at 7:15AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of Illinois, including the following areas, Adams IL, Brown IL, Calhoun IL and Pike IL. Portions of Missouri, including the following areas, Knox MO, Lewis MO, Lincoln MO, Marion MO, Monroe MO, Pike MO, Ralls MO and Shelby MO. * WHEN...Until 10 AM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Another round of thunderstorms is expected to continue overnight period with locally heavy rain possible. Some areas within the watch have already received heavy rainfall in days leading up to tonight`s round of thunderstorms. Locations that previously received heavy rainfall will be more susceptible to flash flooding potential.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
